review_text: I'm the author of Lick It! Creamy Dreamy Vegan Ice Creams Your Mouth Will Love and this is the ice cream maker that I use. It's easy to use, makes great ice cream, is fairly quiet. I've had it for about 5 years and have made a LOT of ice cream with it and it's still going strong.
summary: Ice Cream Cookbook Authors Machine of Choice
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
